quoted.text: A full-body studio portrait of a handsome young East Asian woman sitting on the floor in front of a light purple backdrop. She is wearing a cozy, oversized lavender chunky-knit sweater, white skirt, and white socks. The background is decorated with playful, hand-drawn purple doodles and text, including "A", "ANNISA", paper airplanes, and flowers, in the style of a K-pop photocard or fanzine cover.
